org.svvrl.goal.core.aut.fsa
Class CompleteFSAGenerator

java.lang.Object
  org.svvrl.goal.core.aut.fsa.CompleteFSAGenerator

public class CompleteFSAGenerator
extends java.lang.Object

This class provides a generator to generate finite state automata of a state size and an alphabet size completely. The user can specify a callback function to the generator. Whenever an automaton is generated, the callback function will be invoked. The propositions start from p, q, r, …. The classical symbols start from 1, 2, 3, …. By default, all automata of the specified state size and the specified alphabet size will be generated even if they are isomorphic or equivalent to some automata already generated. This generator provides an option to skip the generation of empty automata.

Author:
Ming-Hsien Tsai

Parameters:
s - a size of states
a - a size of atomic propositions or classical symbols
t - an alphabet type
c - an acceptance condition, which should specify an acceptance condition of class AbstractNBWLikeAcc
b - a callback function
